sourceString: Source: Earned during the 2019 Solstice of Heroes event.

displayProperties.description: Complete Gambit matches, collect Elemental Orbs using a matching [Arc] / [Solar] / [Void] subclass, and, as a team, defeat opposing Guardians in the Crucible or Gambit using Arc weapons.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Helm (Renewed)
